item.title: Stovies
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (Oven 180°C) 1 onion1lb sausages, or other meat. Cut sausages in half or smaller.Potatoes, peeled and sliced.1pt stock Fry onion and meat in oil. Layer sliced potatoes over meat. Cover and cook in oven for 30mins. Serve with vegetables. Serves 4, possibly. I’m not too sure about the quantities of potato.

item.title: Chicken Casserole
item.dc:creator: Ian Stark
item.description: (Serves 4, oven at 180°C) 4 chicken portions Seasoned flour: 2 tbs flour, 1 tsp salt, ½tsp pepper2 tbs vegetable oil2 oz butter1 chopped onion1 sliced red pepper2 oz chopped mushrooms1 tsp tomato purée1 tsp paprika½ pt stock1 glass red wine Skin chicken, shake in bag with seasoned flour (or turn in bowl).
